pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)2 Clover, 1 Flower Seeds, 1 Frisbee, 1 Empty Upgrade Packet, 175 Sun value.

pages.title: âœ‚ Crowd Controller
pages.text: $(#25228d)Hurls a spread of Boomerangs that deal damage coming and going!

text: $(#bd951a)Damage: $()$(#ff0000)1x6 DMG/1.5s (3 Pierce, shots hit on return)

$(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Shoots in the middle and in a cone shape. Pierces up to 3 Zombies, then the projectile comes back dealing damage to the Zombies it pierced. Can target Flying Zombies.
$(br)$(#bd951a)As the first new member to your home defense team, Bloomerang enjoys listening to his Bob Barley albums.
